data.actual_result: You get an in-app notification despite viewing the channel
data.expected_result: You don't get an in-app notification because you're viewing the channel
data.short_description: You receive in-app notifications for channels you're actively viewing on another device
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you're able to receive in-app notifications - Open a DM on another device - Have that user send you a DM - Observe your phone screen when you receive the DM
